fields.headline: Visiting Tonga
fields.bodyText: I am hoping to travel to Tonga in mid-August of this year, and would like to know about the good and bad points of these islands. I'm particular interested in how one books direct for flights, accomodation, and activities (whale-watching, scuba diving, surfing, etc). Also, I'll be going alone - will this be a problem? Joe Tobin
